subject: Law
title: Material Breach vs. Minor Breach
description: A fast breakdown of Material Breach vs. Minor Breach for builders.

hook.text: A builder finishes a house but uses the wrong brand of pipe. Can the buyer refuse to pay entirely?

buildup.text: A material breach is a failure so significant that it undermines the entire purpose of the contract.

discovery.text: A minor breach is a small deviation that doesn't destroy the contract's value. The deal continues.

twist.text: A material breach lets the injured party cancel the contract. A minor breach only allows a claim for damages.

climax.text: Courts weigh how much benefit the injured party received and whether the breach can be cured.

punchline.text: Not all breaches break the deal. The severity determines the remedy.

quiz.question: What can the injured party do after a material breach?
